Class TilePortrayal

  • java.lang.Object
    • sim.portrayal.SimplePortrayal2D

        • geomason.TilePortrayal
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, Portrayal, Portrayal2D

    public class TilePortrayal
extends GeomPortrayal
    Author:
    Norman Langner Portrayal for the agents. Sets certain colors, if they changed their destination because they saw a display.
